description:
Hit singletrack in shoes that are happy in the dirt. The XC1 use a robust, perforated upper that lets your feet breathe when you put the hammer down. Equipped with a glass reinforced nylon midsole, you get great power transfer.

  • Synthetic leather upper is easy to clean and breathes well
  • Glass fibre reinforced nylon sole provides stiff pedalling platform
  • Triple hook and loops straps
  • Offset strap design reduces pressure on the top of the foot
  • XC racing pattern tread offers secure grip on the ground an easy cleat engagement on the pedal
  • Compatible with 2-bolt cleats
name: Shimano XC100 Cycling Shoes - Unisex
